contentrichtext.text: The '''[[Volvo]] Safety Concept Car (SCC)''' is an [[Experimental Safety Vehicle|ESV]] [[concept car]] which was first shown at the 2001 [[North American International Auto Show]] in [[Detroit, Michigan]]. The car was the first and, to date, the only car to have an experimental criss-cross seatbelt Design elements from the car were later used in the [[Volvo C30]] which went into production in 2007. == External links == * [http://img2.netcarshow.com/Volvo-SCC_Concept_2001_800x600_wallpaper_06.jpg] * [http://www.conceptcars.it/case/volvo.htm Gallery] [[Category:Volvo concept vehicles|SCC]] {{Modern-auto-stub}}
